comments.body: This test doesn't reproduce the problem condition, so it doesn't verify that the fix addresses the problem.
the problem was that concurrent requests were all sent to a single backend connection. this test demonstrates that is no longer the case (and fails when run against master)

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/80313 was the issue you were thinking of, which is related to how the http.Client deals with requests over connections it thinks are alive but are in fact dead. that issue is still open
